summary.span: Implements management and administrative functionality for Web Parts personalization.

span.span: Implements management and administrative functionality for Web Parts personalization.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別提供數個靜態方法和屬性會公開管理和 Web 組件個人化的系統管理功能。This class provides several static methods and properties that expose management and administrative functionality for Web Parts personalization. 這些方法套用至預設的個人化提供者中設定Web 組件控制項的控制項。These methods apply to the default personalization provider configured in the control for a Web Parts control. 如果您需要管理做為個人化提供者的幾個資料存放區，您應該在個別的個人化提供者類別上直接使用方法。If you need to administer several data stores that are acting as personalization providers, you should use the methods on the individual personalization provider classes directly. 請注意 個人化提供者設定收集控制項是可從靜態屬性。Note that the collection of configured personalization providers for a control is available from the static property. 請務必注意，如果您的 Web 應用程式不會在執行預設信任層級無法個人化或更高版本 (您可以設定自訂的信任層級，在 Web.config 檔案使用``項目)。It is important to be aware that personalization will fail if your Web application does not run at the default trust level of or higher (you can set custom trust levels in a Web.config file using the `` element). 和這兩個類別會檢查信任層級初始化的時間。The and classes both check for a trust level of when they are initialized. 如果您設定您的應用程式執行的信任層級，並使用預設提供者來管理您的應用程式的個人化資料則會應用程式嘗試存取個人化資料，第一次失敗，因為 ASP.NET 背景工作處理序中執行信任並沒有呼叫各種類別中的必要權限命名空間。If you configure your application to run at a trust level of , and you use the default provider to manage the personalization data for your application, the first time that the application tries to access personalization data, it will fail because an ASP.NET worker process running in trust does not have the permissions necessary to call into the various classes in the namespace. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用數種方法在類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use several methods in the class. 這個範例包含參考名為 Web 組件使用者控制項的.aspx 網頁`Persadmin.ascx`。This example consists of an .aspx page that references a Web Parts user control named `Persadmin.ascx`. 下列程式碼提供範例.aspx 檔案。The following code provides the .aspx file for the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PersAdmin#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PersAdmin/CS/defaultcs.aspx#7)] 這個程式碼提供`Persadmin.ascx`控制項。This code provides the `Persadmin.ascx` control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PersAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PersAdmin/CS/PersAdmin.ascx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式名稱會影響資料擷取和儲存個人化提供者，並允許透過設定相同的應用程式名稱、 共用資料，或分割資料，在相同的資料庫，藉由指定不同的多個應用程式應用程式名稱。The application name affects the data retrieved and saved by the personalization provider, and allows for multiple applications to either share data by setting an identical application name, or partition data within the same database by specifying different application names. Web.config 或 System.config 檔案的個人化提供者 區段中找到應用程式名稱。The application name is found in the personalization provider section of the Web.config or System.config file. > [!CAUTION] > 因為由提供服務的所有要求會都使用單一預設設定檔提供者執行個體物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是安全執行緒的多個寫入，以及變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread-safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建議您避免程式碼，以讓使用者能夠設定屬性除非所需。It is recommended that you avoid code to allow users to set the property unless required. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要為系統管理的應用程式管理多個應用程式的設定檔資料。An example of an application where setting the property might be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該在單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法傳回的集合執行個體，每位使用者個人化狀態資訊所在`pathToMatch`參數值符合的頁面上，路徑`usernameToMatch`符合具有關聯的個人化資料的使用者名稱頁面上，而是使用者會視為非使用中。This method returns a collection of instances, per-user personalization state information where the `pathToMatch` parameter value matches the path of a page, `usernameToMatch` matches a user name that has personalization data associated with that page, and the users are considered inactive. 換句話說，傳回每個記錄使用者的屬性值小於或等於`userInactiveSinceDate`。In other words, for each returned record the user's property value is less than or equal to `userInactiveSinceDate`. 傳回的集合僅包含執行個體。The returned collection contains only instances. 這個方法會將查詢萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎資料存放區。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 目前取決於每個提供者處理等星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 字元的方式支援萬用字元。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，對於 SQL 標準的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑上以出現在開頭、 結尾或中間的搜尋字串文字中的萬用字元屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭為"~/vdir"，所有路徑屬性會設定為"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 同樣地，萬用字元搜尋部分的使用者名稱可能會出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有啟動的使用者名稱與"John"，屬性會看起來像"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the property would look like "John%". 使用預設的個人化提供者， -字母順序傳回衍生的物件，然後依照依遞增順序的路徑和使用者名稱的組合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中物件的順序取決於提供者。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 如果`userInactiveSinceDate`是，然後從這個方法傳回的值相當於。If `userInactiveSinceDate` is , then the returned values from this method are equivalent to . 同時`pathToMatch`和`usernameToMatch`可以`null`。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`參數可以包含逗號 （，），因為某些資料存放區，例如執行 Microsoft SQL Server，允許使用逗號當做萬用字元。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can include commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters.

集合只包含執行個體。The collection contains only instances. 這個方法會將參數萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎的個人化提供者，所以資料存放區處理這些字元取決於提供者處理例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 字元。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，對於 SQL 標準的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑上以出現在開頭、 結尾或中間的搜尋字串文字中的萬用字元屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭為"~/vdir"，所有路徑屬性會設定為"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 同樣地，萬用字元搜尋部分的使用者名稱可能會出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有啟動的使用者名稱與"John"，屬性會看起來像"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the property would look like "John%". 使用預設的個人化提供者， -字母順序傳回衍生的物件，然後依照依遞增順序的路徑和使用者名稱的組合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中物件的順序取決於提供者。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 如果`userInactiveSinceDate`是，然後從這個方法傳回的值相當於。If `userInactiveSinceDate` is , then the returned values from this method are equivalent to . 同時`pathToMatch`和`usernameToMatch`可以`null`。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`參數可以有逗號 （，），因為某些資料存放區，例如執行 Microsoft SQL Server，允許使用逗號當做萬用字元。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters. 傳回的資料由限制`pageIndex`和`pageSize`，其中`pageIndex`控制哪一筆記錄傳回和`pageSize`會控制要傳回的記錄數目。The data returned is constrained by `pageIndex` and `pageSize`, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records to return. 例如，如果`pageIndex`已設定為 0 和`pageSize`已設為 25，傳回的資料就是前 25 個項目。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果`pageIndex`已設為 1 和`pageSize`已設為 25，傳回的資料會是項目到 50 個 26。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`參數會傳回可用的記錄總數。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available.

personalization state data. 集合只包含執行個體。The collection contains only instances. 這個方法會將參數萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎的個人化提供者，所以資料存放區處理這些字元取決於提供者處理例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 字元。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，對於 SQL 標準的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑上以出現在開頭、 結尾或中間的搜尋字串文字中的萬用字元屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭為"~/vdir"，所有路徑屬性會設定為"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 使用預設的個人化提供者， -字母順序傳回衍生的物件，然後依照依遞增順序的路徑和使用者名稱的組合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中物件的順序取決於提供者。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. `pathToMatch`參數可以是`null`。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果設定為`null`，執行查詢時，會忽略此參數。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries. 傳回的資料由限制`pageIndex`和`pageSize`，其中`pageIndex`控制哪一筆記錄傳回和`pageSize`會控制要傳回的記錄數目。The data returned is constrained by `pageIndex` and `pageSize`, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records to return. 例如，如果`pageIndex`已設定為 0 和`pageSize`已設為 25，傳回的資料就是前 25 個項目。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果`pageIndex`已設為 1 和`pageSize`已設為 25，傳回的資料會是項目到 50 個 26。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`參數會傳回可用的記錄總數。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法傳回的集合執行個體`pathToMatch`參數值符合頁面的路徑和`usernameToMatch`符合具有與該網頁相關聯的個人化資料的使用者名稱。This method returns a collection of instances where the `pathToMatch` parameter value matches the path of a page, and `usernameToMatch` matches a user name that has personalization data associated with that page. 集合只包含執行個體。The collection contains only instances. 這個方法會將參數萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎的個人化提供者，所以資料存放區處理這些字元取決於提供者處理例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 字元。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，對於 SQL 標準的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑上以出現在開頭、 結尾或中間的搜尋字串文字中的萬用字元屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭為"~/vdir"，所有路徑屬性會設定為"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 同樣地，萬用字元搜尋部分的使用者名稱可能會出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有啟動的使用者名稱與"John"，屬性會看起來像"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the property would look like "John%". 使用預設的個人化提供者， -字母順序傳回衍生的物件，然後依照依遞增順序的路徑和使用者名稱的組合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中物件的順序取決於提供者。The ordering of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 同時`pathToMatch`和`usernameToMatch`可以`null`。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`參數可以有逗號 （，），因為某些資料存放區，例如執行 Microsoft SQL Server，允許使用逗號當做萬用字元。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 完整範例，請參閱在類別概觀主題。The complete example can be found in the class overview topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回集合中的項目主要根據範圍，並接著對應到該範圍的記錄進一步縮減為子集，根據`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The items in the collection returned are based primarily on scope, and then the records corresponding to that scope are further reduced to a subset based on the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. 傳回的集合包含僅限，執行個體或僅限執行個體。The collection returned contains either instances only, or instances only. 傳回的項目受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數，其中`pageIndex`控制哪一筆記錄傳回和`pageSize`控制傳回的記錄數目。The items returned are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records returned. 例如，如果`pageIndex`已設定為 0 和`pageSize`已設為 25，傳回的資料就是前 25 個項目。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果`pageIndex`已設為 1 和`pageSize`已設為 25，傳回的資料會是項目到 50 個 26。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`參數會傳回可用的記錄總數。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available. 使用預設的個人化提供者， -字母順序傳回衍生的物件，然後依照依遞增順序的路徑和使用者名稱的組合。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 集合中物件的順序取決於提供者。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回記錄頁面符合指定的位置`pathtoMatch`參數和使用者的屬性值小於或等於屬性值。This method returns records where the page matches the specified `pathtoMatch` parameter and the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 如果設，會傳回所有使用者的個人化資訊的計數。If is set to , a count of all users' personalization information is returned. 請注意，`pathToMatch`參數可以包含萬用字元。Note that the `pathToMatch` parameter can include wildcard characters. 方法會將萬用字元傳遞至基礎資料存放區。The method passes wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 萬用字元的支援，目前取決於每個提供者處理例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 字元。Wildcard character support is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，對於 SQL 標準的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑上以出現在開頭、 結尾或中間的搜尋字串文字中的萬用字元屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭為"~/vdir"，所有路徑屬性會設定為"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". `pathToMatch`參數可以是`null`。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果設定為`null`，執行查詢時，會忽略此參數。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回每位使用者數目的計數個人化項目中所存在的基礎資料存放區指定`usernameToMatch`。This method returns a count of the number of per-user personalization items in the underlying data store that exist for the given `usernameToMatch`. 請注意，`usernameToMatch`參數可以包含萬用字元。Note that the `usernameToMatch` parameter can include wildcard characters. 這個方法會將萬用字元傳遞至基礎資料存放區。This method passes wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 萬用字元的支援，目前取決於每個提供者處理例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 字元。Wildcard character support is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，SQL 標準的資料存放區，萬用字元搜尋部分的使用者名稱可能會出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, a wildcard search on a partial user name can have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有啟動的使用者名稱與"John"，參數會看起來像"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". `usernameToMatch`參數可以是`null`。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果設定為`null`，執行查詢時，會忽略此參數。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries. `usernameToMatch`參數可包含逗號 （，），因為某些資料存放區，例如執行 Microsoft SQL Server，允許使用逗號當做萬用字元。The `usernameToMatch` parameter is allowed to have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會重設基礎資料存放區中指定的路徑，與相關聯的所有每個使用者狀態，使用者的屬性值小於或等於屬性值。This method resets all per-user state in the underlying data store associated with the specified path, where the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 為資料存放區需要一個以上的資料列的資料來儲存個人化狀態 頁面上，或為使用者與頁面組合，重設資料列計數可能會不同的個人化狀態計數。For data stores that require more than one row of data to store personalization state for a page, or for a user and page combination, the count of reset rows might differ from the count of personalization state. 如果基礎提供者會公開可感知交易的資料存放區，這個方法會在單一交易中執行其作業。If the underlying provider exposes data from a transaction-aware data store, this method performs its operations in a single transaction. 它不是嘗試重設共用不存在的狀態錯誤。It is not an error to attempt to reset nonexistent shared state. 如果是，這個方法有效地重設基礎資料存放區指定路徑中的所有每個使用者資料。If is , this method effectively resets all per-user data in the underlying data store for the specified path.
